name: web-node
description: a high reliable python web library

documentationWebsite.name: webnode
documentationWebsite.tagline: a high reliable python web library<!--deDE:eine Pythonbibliothek für hochzuverlässigkeits Ansprüche im Web-->

scripts.update: npm run clear && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.clear: rm apiDocumentation --recursive --force && find './' -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete && find './' -type f -name '*.pyo' -delete
